00018 namespace BulletHell.System
00019 {
00020     /* This class's job is to provide a dynamic size diaglogbox which contains the title, message, and yes/no option */
00021     public class Dialog : GameState
00022     {
00023         #region Fields
00024 
00025         /* b => bottom; c => center; t => top; l => left; r => right */
00026         private Texture2D bc, bl, br, cc, cl, cr, tc, tl, tr;
00027         private Vector2 blPos, brPos, tlPos, trPos;
00028         private Rectangle bcRect, ccRect, tcRect, clRect, crRect;
00029         private string title, message;
00030         private Vector2 position, titlePos, msgPos, optionPos;
00031         private int index, selected, height, width;
00032         #endregion
00033 
00034         #region Initialization
00035         public Dialog(string title, string message, Vector2 position2)
00036         {
00037             this.title = title;
00038             this.message = message;
00039             position = position2;
00040             setUp();
00041         }
00042 
00043         protected override void Initialize()
00044         {
00045             this.LoadContent();
00046         }
00047 
00048         private void setUp(){
00049             int x = (int)position.X;
00050             int y = (int)position.Y;
00051             int paddingX = 10, paddingY = 10;
00052             height = (int)_GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString(message).Y;
00053             width = (int)_GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString(message).X;
00054 
00055             /* Calculations for position of each texture */
00056             tlPos = new Vector2(x - width / 2 - tl.Width - paddingX, y - height / 2 - tl.Height - paddingY);
00057             trPos = new Vector2(x + width / 2 + paddingX, y - height / 2 - tr.Height - paddingY);
00058             tcRect = new Rectangle(x - width / 2 - paddingX, y - height / 2 - tl.Height - paddingY,
00059                 width + 2 * paddingX, height + 2 * paddingY);
00060 
00061             clRect = new Rectangle(x - width / 2 - cl.Width - paddingX, y - height / 2 - paddingY,
00062                 cl.Width + paddingX, 2 * height + 2 * paddingY);
00063             crRect = new Rectangle(x + width / 2, y - height / 2 - paddingY,
00064                 cr.Width + paddingX, 2 * height + 2 * paddingY);
00065             ccRect = new Rectangle(x - width / 2 - paddingX, y - height / 2 - paddingY, width + 2 * paddingX, 2 * height + 2 * paddingY);
00066 
00067             blPos = new Vector2(x - width / 2 - bl.Width - paddingX, y + height + height/2 + paddingY);
00068             brPos = new Vector2(x + width / 2 + paddingX, y + height + height / 2 + paddingY);
00069             bcRect = new Rectangle(x - width / 2 - paddingX, y + height + height / 2 + paddingY,
00070                 width + 2 * paddingX, br.Height);
00071 
00072             //this.position = new Vector2((position.X - dialogBox.Width) / 2, (position.Y - dialogBox.Height) / 2);
00073             titlePos = new Vector2(tcRect.X + paddingX, tcRect.Y + paddingY);
00074             msgPos = new Vector2(ccRect.X + paddingX, paddingY / 2 + titlePos.Y + _GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString(title).Y);
00075             optionPos = new Vector2(x, y + height);
00076             index = 0;
00077             selected = -1;
00078         }
00079         #endregion
00080 
00081         #region Contents
00082         internal override void LoadContent()
00083         {
00084             bc = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_bc");
00085             bl = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_bl");
00086             br = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_br");
00087             tc = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_tc");
00088             tl = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_tl");
00089             tr = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_tr");
00090             cc = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_cc");
00091             cl = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_cl");
00092             cr = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"sprites/DialogBox/DialogBox_cr");
00093         }
00094 
00095         protected override void UnloadContent() { }
00096         #endregion
00097 
00098         #region Update and Draw
00099         internal override void Update(GameTime gameTime)
00100         {
00101             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState = Keyboard.GetState();
00102             if (selected == -1)
00103             {
00104                 if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyRight())
00105                 {
00106                     index = (index > 0) ? index - 1 : 1;
00107                     //_GLOBAL. .play("cursorMove");
00108                 }
00109                 else if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyLeft())
00110                 {
00111                     index = (index < 1) ? index + 1 : 0;
00112                     //BulletHell.audioManager.play("cursorMove");
00113                 }
00114                 else if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyEnter())
00115                 {
00116                     selected = index;
00117                     //BulletHell.audioManager.play("confrim");
00118                 }
00119                 else if (_GLOBAL.InputHandler.isKeyEscape())
00120                 {
00121                     selected = 0;
00122                 }
00123                 NeedUpdate = true;
00124             }
00125             else
00126             {
00127                 if (selected == 1)
00128                     _GLOBAL.Quit = true;
00129                 selected = -1;
00130                 _GLOBAL.inGameState = false;
00131                 NeedDraw = false;
00132                 NeedUpdate = false;
00133             }
00134             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.previousKeyboardState = _GLOBAL.InputHandler.keyboardState;
00135         }
00136 
00137         internal override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00138         {
00139             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Begin(SpriteBlendMode.AlphaBlend);
00140             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(tl, tlPos, Color.White);
00141             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(tc, tcRect, Color.White);
00142             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(tr, trPos, Color.White);
00143 
00144             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(cl, clRect, Color.White);
00145             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(cc, ccRect, Color.White);
00146             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(cr, crRect, Color.White);
00147 
00148             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(bl, blPos, Color.White);
00149             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(bc, bcRect, Color.White);
00150             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(br, brPos, Color.White);
00151 
00152             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, title, titlePos, Color.White);
00153             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, message, msgPos, Color.White);
00154             optionPos.X = position.X - width / 3;
00155             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, "No", optionPos, Color.White, 0.0f, Vector2.Zero, (index == 0) ? 1.25f : 1.0f, SpriteEffects.None, 0.0f);
00156             optionPos.X = position.X + width / 3 - (int)(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont.MeasureString("Yes").X);
00157             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, "Yes", optionPos, Color.White, 0.0f, Vector2.Zero, (index == 1) ? 1.25f : 1.0f, SpriteEffects.None, 0.0f);
00158             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.End();
00159         }
00160         #endregion
00161     }
00162 }
